data.message: Thanks for connecting us in a very personal way! Knowledge is power! And no one on Earth needs to be left behind. You've changed our world and I'm so grateful to every one at Facebook❤️

replies.message: Hi Renene! Thanks for putting a smile on our face. We appreciate the kind words and are happy to have you celebrate this accomplishment with us. <3 -Azaria
I love Facebook love to write my friends and everything
Btw FB. I appreciate u too. Reconnected with many old dear friends, reconnected with family, made new friends, learned a lot of things, And Renee is right, no one should be left behind.

I'm not much of a facebooker - keeping up w/ the 110 or so people who've invited me and their dozens of friends many of whom  I likely also know  I'd find hard.  Well, not hard, daunting.
But I do like planes and this one is neat.  But I don't quite get it.  If the thing flies as fast as say a blimp, would that mean these remote communities get something like 15  minutes of airtime, and only when they knew it was about to head over?  How big can the fleet be?  And the people in the these remote places are going to have computers  and some sort of way to get the internet; is beamed down and captured by a dish or something?
I have the same ? Howard does.
The pop up ads are annoying.
Awesome way to bring access to everyone, thank you so much FB
Wow, we go places all the time to volunteer right here in the US and cannot get service! This will be great. God Bless you all!!

So thankful you keep up to date fb.
.we appreciate your devotion..
fb is my daily news, daily communication with my family, shopping, i read motivation quotes and i read daily bible

Milagros Salvador Bumagat our president in the philippines won thru fb he has no money no machinery people voted for him through the help of fb keep posting good news and sharing about president duterte!

Thank-You for connecting more 
people with the knowledge and 
entertainment that Facebook 
brings.  Also helping friends stay in contact.
Thanks for the kind words, Cindy! If you're interested in learning more about Aquila, please visit: http://bit.ly/2a2GnVU. :) -Azaria
